about_the_game:
We're working on it, so stay tuned!


In "Winner's Break," players take on the role of a lonely high school student, Qi Ming.
Due to family issues, Qi Ming spends his days wandering aimlessly and losing direction in his studies.
One day, his homeroom teacher entrusts him with delivering class materials to the class's "Xin Su."
This chance encounter becomes an opportunity to change Qi Ming's life.
Qi Ming unexpectedly witnesses the heart star being harassed by gangsters, and in a moment of bravery, he picks up a billiard cue and wins the game despite having no previous experience.
Thus, the transformation of a troubled youth begins.
Facing various difficulties and obstacles, Qi Ming sets out on a journey on a meteor shower night.
With the guidance of the Xin Su, Qi Ming gradually grows stronger on the billiard field and ultimately becomes a passionate and talented professional billiard superstar. In the game, players take on the role of Qi Ming to fully explore their billiard skills while experiencing the story of Qi Ming's youth and love.


The game can be divided into two parts, "Role-Play" and "Billiards".
In Role-Play part, players can explore freely in the school and in the city of Lianhai, looking for plots that can be triggered and developing relationships with their partners.
As your bonding with your partners deepens, you can acquire special skills for use in billiard games.
Every once in a while, there will be an important billiard match event where players need to use their honed out abilities to win the match and advance the plot.


In "Winner's Break," billiards is the core theme of the game.
Players must pocket all eight balls on the table to win the game.
Billiards, as a sport, requires players to have precise control over their movements, analyze their opponent's actions, and have excellent strategic thinking skills.
Despite its seemingly simple gameplay, the game involves a high degree of tactics and strategy.

Different from regular billiards games, "Winner's Break" combines billiards with a skill system, adding more fun and competition to the game.
In matches, players must defeat various opponents, including experienced professional players and experts with special abilities.
For beginners, the game also provides multiple opportunities to practice and hone their skills, helping them gradually advance and become a professional player.

We're working on it, so stay tuned!


In "Winner's Break," players take on the role of a lonely high school student, Qi Ming.
Due to family issues, Qi Ming spends his days wandering aimlessly and losing direction in his studies.
One day, his homeroom teacher entrusts him with delivering class materials to the class's "Xin Su."
This chance encounter becomes an opportunity to change Qi Ming's life.
Qi Ming unexpectedly witnesses the heart star being harassed by gangsters, and in a moment of bravery, he picks up a billiard cue and wins the game despite having no previous experience.
Thus, the transformation of a troubled youth begins.
Facing various difficulties and obstacles, Qi Ming sets out on a journey on a meteor shower night.
With the guidance of the Xin Su, Qi Ming gradually grows stronger on the billiard field and ultimately becomes a passionate and talented professional billiard superstar. In the game, players take on the role of Qi Ming to fully explore their billiard skills while experiencing the story of Qi Ming's youth and love.


The game can be divided into two parts, "Role-Play" and "Billiards".
In Role-Play part, players can explore freely in the school and in the city of Lianhai, looking for plots that can be triggered and developing relationships with their partners.
As your bonding with your partners deepens, you can acquire special skills for use in billiard games.
Every once in a while, there will be an important billiard match event where players need to use their honed out abilities to win the match and advance the plot.


In "Winner's Break," billiards is the core theme of the game.
Players must pocket all eight balls on the table to win the game.
Billiards, as a sport, requires players to have precise control over their movements, analyze their opponent's actions, and have excellent strategic thinking skills.
Despite its seemingly simple gameplay, the game involves a high degree of tactics and strategy.

Different from regular billiards games, "Winner's Break" combines billiards with a skill system, adding more fun and competition to the game.
In matches, players must defeat various opponents, including experienced professional players and experts with special abilities.
For beginners, the game also provides multiple opportunities to practice and hone their skills, helping them gradually advance and become a professional player.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Winner's Break

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: In Winner's Break, players will experience a unique story, exciting pool matches and a touching romantic story. By challenging various levels and participating in competition, players can gradually discover the protagonist’s inner world, and enjoy the joy of growth and the fun of challenge.
supported_languages:
English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, German, Thai, Korean
*languages with full audio support
